uk.ac.ox.comlab.oxpath.oxpathTreeWalker
Class OXPathDomNode

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ox.comlab.oxpath.oxpathTreeWalker.OXPathDomNode

public class OXPathDomNode
extends java.lang.Object

Class for representing OXPathDomNode. Acts as a wrapper for HtmlUnit's DomNode (and its child) decorating with parent marker and current marker references

Author:
AndrewJSel

Constructor Detail

OXPathDomNode

public OXPathDomNode(com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode iNode,
                     int iParent,
                     int iLast)
Constructor for the class. Object "glues" together a DomNode in HtmlUnit's implementation, a reference to the parent marker, and a reference to the last marker used

Parameters:
iNode - DomNode in HtmlUnit to use
iParent - reference to parent marker
iLast - reference to current marker

getByXPath

public OXPathNodeList<OXPathDomNode> getByXPath(java.lang.String stepString,
                                                boolean forward)
                                         throws BadDataException
Returns the node by calling the getByXPath in HtmlUnit. Only use when return value is an XPath nodeset data type

Parameters:
stepString - xpath query as a String
forward - true for forward navigation, false otherwise
Returns:
OXPathNodeList with all relevant nodes
Throws:
BadDataException - in case of error on adding nodes to the list (return value of xpath call is not a nodelist)
